item.title: Hurricane Erin still a danger to swimmers at many East Coast beaches
item.description: Meteorologists are closely tracking the projected path of Hurricane Erin, the first hurricane to develop over the Atlantic this year.

item.title: 8/21: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump surveying National Guard policing in D.C.; Couple wrongly accused of kidnapping hoax helps solve cases connected to abductor.

item.title: 8/21: The Daily Report
item.description: Jericka Duncan reports on two states' progress in redistricting plans, and the larger impact of rapid climate change in Antarctica.

item.title: 8/21: CBS Evening News
item.description: Hurricane Erin lashes Outer Banks with coastal flooding and strong winds; When Mona Lisa was stolen from the Louvre

item.title: 6 found dead during confined space rescue at Northern Colorado dairy farm
item.description: Six people were found dead Wednesday evening at a dairy farm in Northern Colorado, officials said.
